Class NetworkAnalysisController

java.lang.Object
com.xml.editor.NetworkAnalysisController
public class NetworkAnalysisController extends Object
Controller class for handling the interactions in the network analysis UI. It allows the user to toggle themes, analyze mutual followers, suggest users, and perform network analysis on XML data.

  • Constructor Details

    • NetworkAnalysisController

      public NetworkAnalysisController()

  • Method Details

    • toggleTheme

      public void toggleTheme(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Toggles the theme between light and dark mode. Updates the stylesheets and image icons based on the current theme.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by the theme toggle button.

    • mutualuserpress

      public void mutualuserpress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action when the "Mutual Users" button is pressed. Parses the input user IDs and finds mutual followers between the users. If the input is invalid, displays an error message.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by the "Mutual Users" button.

    • suggestUserPress

      public void suggestUserPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action when the "Suggest User" button is pressed. Suggests users for a given user ID. If the input is invalid or there are no suggestions, it displays an appropriate message.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by the "Suggest User" button.

    • networkDataPress

      public void networkDataPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the action when the "Network Data" button is pressed. Analyzes the network data based on the input XML data and displays the results.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by the "Network Data" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while processing the data.
